author: Discovery
description:
Zak and the team do a house call for a mother and daughter, who are petrified by the malevolent spirit that has attached itself to the mother.

#Discovery #GhostAdventures

About Ghost Adventures:
Zak Bagans and his crew investigate the most haunted places in the world. During the dusk-to-dawn lockdown, key evidence is documented to uncover the truth behind paranormal activity.
